text: And we said we would think about it,
and the nurses kept looking for us,
wherever we were, as if we were delinquents.
They even said to do it without telling your husband.
‘Your husband probably wants you to be filled with children”...
And that’s how they forced us.
They forced us because we were weak
they forced us to get that ligation.
As we speak in our land,
They sent us home without treatment for nothing,
Now they have left us incapacitated,
